-----------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
High in the mountains of Colorado is a mental hospital. Players will take on the role of the journalist, Miles Apshura who investigates strange happenings in the house for the mentally ill. The search for the truth leads him to the mountains Massive, where he will meet the most terrible of his nightmares, lying on the edge of science and religion. The sole purpose of the protagonist gets out of the hospital, come what may.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Features Repack:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
* Removed all languages except English 
* Nothing was recoded
* Lossless repack
* Integrated update 4
* Installation time ~ 5 minutes (depending on your computer)
* Game Version 1.4, Uploaded 6 September 2013 and is based on a steam version of the game
* No need for third-party installers and updates. Game content is fully loaded and packed in a simple installer.
* Repack by Joker_RETURNS(R.G. MoMuGa)
------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
1. Open setup.exe
2. Follow instructions and install the game
3. Play by clicking on the 32 bit or 64 bit desktop shortcut
Note:
- If you have a 32 bit system, play the game by opening the 32 bit shortcut
- If you have a 64 bit system, play the game by opening the 64 bit shortcut
----
- Ps. You can delete the laucher shortcut, it's not working.
